entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
